member.name: T:ModernWpf.MahApps.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Strings.TimePickerAM
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to AM.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Strings.TimePickerHour
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to hour.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Strings.TimePickerMinute
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to minute.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Strings.TimePickerSecond
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to second.

member.name: F:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.DateTimeComponentSelector.UseSystemFocusVisualsProperty
member.summary: Identifies the UseSystemFocusVisuals dependency property.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.DateTimeComponentSelector.UseSystemFocusVisuals
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control uses focus visuals that are drawn by the system or those defined in the control template.
member.returns: **true** if the control uses focus visuals drawn by the system; **false** if the control uses focus visuals defined in the ControlTemplate. The default is **false**; see Remarks.

member.name: T:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker
member.summary: Represents a control that allows a user to pick a time value.

member.name: M:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SimpleTimePicker class.

member.name: F:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.UseSystemFocusVisualsProperty
member.summary: Identifies the UseSystemFocusVisuals dependency property.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.UseSystemFocusVisuals
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control uses focus visuals that are drawn by the system or those defined in the control template.
member.returns: **true** if the control uses focus visuals drawn by the system; **false** if the control uses focus visuals defined in the ControlTemplate. The default is **false**; see Remarks.

member.name: F:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.CornerRadiusProperty
member.summary: Identifies the CornerRadius dependency property.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.CornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius for the corners of the control's border.
member.returns: The degree to which the corners are rounded, expressed as values of the CornerRadius structure.

member.name: F:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.HeaderProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Header dependency property.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.Header
member.summary: Gets or sets the content for the control's header.
member.returns: The content of the control's header. The default is **null**.

member.name: F:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.HeaderTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the HeaderTemplate dependency property.

member.name: P:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used to display the content of the control's header.
member.returns: The template that specifies the visualization of the header object. The default is **null**.

member.name: M:ModernWpf.MahApps.Controls.SimpleTimePicker.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Called when the Template's tree has been generated.
